Generation V.Black: It can dig through the ground at a speed of 30 mph . It could give a car running aboveground a good race.
Generation V.White: It makes its way swiftly through the soil by putting both claws together and rotating at high speed.
Generation V.Black 2: By spinning its body, it can dig straight through the ground at a speed of 30 mph.
Generation V.White 2: By spinning its body, it can dig straight through the ground at a speed of 30 mph.

Generation VI.X: It makes its way swiftly through the soil by putting both claws together and rotating at high speed.
Generation VI.Y: By spinning its body, it can dig straight through the ground at a speed of 30 mph.
Generation VI.Omega Ruby: It makes its way swiftly through the soil by putting both claws together and rotating at high speed.
Generation VI.Alpha Sapphire: By spinning its body, it can dig straight through the ground at a speed of 30 mph.

Generation VIII.Sword: It brings its claws together and whirls around at high speed before rushing toward its prey.
Generation VIII.Shield: It's a digger, using its claws to burrow through the ground. It causes damage to vegetable crops, so many farmers have little love for it.

Generation IX.Scarlet: It can dig through the ground at a speed of 30 mph. It could give a car running aboveground a good race.
Generation IX.Violet: It makes its way swiftly through the soil by putting both claws together and rotating at high speed.

Generation V.Black: Wellspring Cave , Chargestone Cave , Mistralton Cave , Twist Mountain ( Dust cloud )
Generation V.White: Wellspring Cave , Chargestone Cave , Mistralton Cave , Twist Mountain ( Dust cloud )
Generation V.Black 2: Relic Passage , Chargestone Cave , Mistralton Cave ( Dust cloud )
Generation V.White 2: Relic Passage , Chargestone Cave , Mistralton Cave ( Dust cloud )

Generation VIII.Sword: Galar Mine , Stony Wilderness , Giant's Mirror , Giant's Cap , Dusty Bowl , Hammerlocke Hills Rolling Fields , Bridge Field ( Max Raid Battle )
Generation VIII.Shield: Galar Mine , Stony Wilderness , Giant's Mirror , Giant's Cap , Dusty Bowl , Hammerlocke Hills Rolling Fields , Bridge Field ( Max Raid Battle )

Generation IX.The Hidden Treasure of Area Zero: Chargestone Cavern , Canyon Biome , Polar Biome Tera Raid Battles ( 3★ )
